div.p: Delhi Principals have a special video message for their students. https://youtu.be/xsWL6SyBEEU
MEALS SERVED DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE Meals will be served during the school closure starting Thursday, March 19, 2020. from 8:30 a.m. to 10:30 a.m., Monday through Friday. At cafeterias at all schools.

In the interest of the health of our community, Delhi Unified School District has decided to join with all other Merced County districts and the Merced County Office of Education and close its schools beginning Thursday, March 19. The district plans to reopen on April 20.

The Delhi Unified School District has internet access available to students 24 hours a day. For Locations, please check the Delhi Unified Website's Homepage: Menu\\Parents-Students\\District Internet Access

The Delhi Unified School District Food Services Department will serve meals during the school closure. A child (18 and Under) does not need to be present for a parent or guardian to pick up a meal for the child.

em.strong: Drive-Through Service, Times, Eligibility, and Locations:

li.strong: Breakfast and lunch will be served together as a grab-and-go from 9:00 a.m. – 11:30 a.m. Monday through Friday.

strong.strong: All Delhi area children 18 years and younger are eligible to receive meals. If your child goes to a school other than a Delhi School, we invite you to visit one of our schools to pick up a meal for your child.

li.strong: You may pick up children's meals at the location closest to their home. Please only receive food from one of our three sites distributing food.

p.em: Thank you. We are here to serve your children.

div.p: Proud to Be the Superintendent of the Delhi Unified School District
